蔪蔪蔪
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 𧀵
Связанный символ (и): 𧀵

蔪字的基本解释

蔪
jiān
〔蔪蔪〕（麦芒）渐渐长（
zh僴g ）长的样子，如“麦秀蔪蔪兮。”

蔪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《集韻》將廉切，平鹽，精。］
通“漸2”。
[②]［shān］
［《集韻》師銜切，平銜，生。］
通“芟1”。
剪灭，芟除。

蔪字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔪； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第20
【唐韻】慈染切【韻會】疾染切，?音漸。【說文】草相蔪苞也。　又【正韻】師銜切，讀作芟。【前漢·賈誼傳】故蔪去不義諸侯，而虛其國。【註】謂芟刈之。　又【集韻】將廉切，音尖。蔪蔪，麥秀。　又鋤咸切，音讒。義同。　或作?。

蔪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔪字的起名意思

暂无。

Su
Basic explanation of words
Su
jiān
〔蔪蔪〕(Maimang) gradually grows (
zh 僴g) Long look, such as "Mai Xiu Lin Xi."
Su
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Jiyun" cuts Lian, flat salt, fine. ]
Pass "Gradually 2".
[②]［shān］
["Jiyun" teacher title cut, flat title, student. ]
Same as "芟1".
Cut out, remove.
Su
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　蔪; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1055 to 20
【Tang Yun】Ciranqie 【Yunhui】Damish and cut, the sound gradually. [Said the text] The grass looks like a bud.　 [Zheng Yun] The title of the teacher is cut, pronounced as Qian. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] So I went to the unrighteous princes, but emptied his country. [Note] It is said that it is Qianguo.　[Jiyun] Cut Lian, the sound tip. Su Su, Mai Xiu.　 Pick up salty slices again, sound slanderous. The same meaning.　Or make?.
Su
